<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" Â· "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} Â· ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//å¦‚æœè¦æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼Œè¯·å»é™¤æ³¨é‡Šï¼Œå»é™¤ä¼šå½±å“æœç´¢é€Ÿåº¦

<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || 'ç”·é¢‘';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || 'å°è¯´';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || 'ç•ªèŒ„';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['æ‰‹åŠ¨å¡«å†™ç•ªèŒ„token(å¯ä¸å¡«)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('æ‚¨è¿˜æœªç™»é™†ç•ªèŒ„è´¦å·ï¼Œæ— æ³•åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®å“¦ï¼');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqtjurl = base_url + "/fqrecommend?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqlsurl = base_url + "/fqhistory?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("ç•ªèŒ„ç™»å½•è¿‡æœŸï¼Œå·²éšè—ç•ªèŒ„ä¹¦æ¶");
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½åˆ†ç»„æ•°æ®...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : 'æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·';
        if (!userName.includes('æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·')) {
            infoData = [{
                title: "ç•ªèŒ„ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ",
                url: fqsjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }, {
                title: "ä¸ªæ€§æ¨è(ç•ªèŒ„)",
                url: fqtjurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }
            }, {
                title: "å†å²é˜…è¯»(ç•ªèŒ„)",
                url: fqlsurl,
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                }

        }

    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("ç•ªèŒ„ç™»å½•è¿‡æœŸï¼Œå·²éšè—ç•ªèŒ„ä¹¦æ¶");
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);

        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("å‘ç°æ ·å¼è·å–å¤±è´¥");
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let qtop = {
    method: "GET",
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie
    },
};
qtop = JSON.stringify(qtop);
let qtsjurl = base_url+'/get_book_shelf,'+qtop
let qtsj = [{

                style: {

                }
            }]
var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
finalData = qtsj.concat(finalData);
JSON.stringify(finalData);

ruleContent.content:

result = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let res;
if (result.match(/å¤§ç°ç‹¼èåˆ/)) {

    res = {
        item_id: result[0],
        tab: result[1],
        title: result[2],
        sources: result[3],
        url: ""
    };

}

if (varia == 'null') {
    varia = '';
}
varia = JSON.stringify({
    'custom': varia
});
//  varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
let book_id = res.book_id;
let item_id = res.item_id;
let tab = res.tab;
let title = res.title;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;
let html = "";
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (url != "" && proxy == "æœ¬åœ°") {
    if (sources == '69ä¹¦å§') {
        let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
        let headers = {
            "Cookie": ck69,
            "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/138.0.0.0"
        };
        let op = JSON.stringify({
            "headers": headers
        });
        java.log(url);
        java.log(op);
        html = java.ajax(url + ',' + op);
    } else {
        html = java.ajax(url);
    }
    java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69ä¹¦å§' && book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
        cookie.removeCookie(url);
        var x = url;
        java.longToast('éœ€è¦çœŸäººéªŒè¯ï¼Œè¯·è¿›å…¥ä»»æ„ä¹¦ç±è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿‡éªŒè¯');
        var s = java.startBrowserAwait(x, "éœ€è¦çœŸäººéªŒè¯ï¼Œè¯·è¿›å…¥ä»»æ„ä¹¦ç±è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿‡éªŒè¯").body();

        let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
        let headers = {
            "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/138.0.0.0",
            "Cookie": ck69
        };
        let op = JSON.stringify({
            "headers": headers
        });
        java.log(op);
        html = java.ajax(url + ',' + op);
        //java.log(html);
    }
};
let content = "";
let data;
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let device, device_type;
try {
    device = java.deviceID();
    device_type = "è‹¹æœ";
} catch (e) {
    try {
        device = java.androidId();
        device_type = "å®‰å“";
    } catch (e) {
        device = "";
        device_type = "å®‰å“";
    }
}

let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
try {
    qtcookie = `qttoken=${String(cookie.getKey(base_url, "qttoken"))}; deviceId=${device};`
} catch (e) {}

var params = {
    html: html,
    item_id: item_id,
    source: sources,
    tab: tab,
    tone_id: tone_id,
    variable: varia,
    version: '4.11.5.1'
};

var content_url = '/content';

if ((sources == "ç•ªèŒ„" || sources == "ä¸ƒçŒ«" || sources == "å¡”è¯»") && getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqpara") == "on" && tab == "å°è¯´") {
    content_url = '/content?review=1';
}

//var signInfo = generateComplexSignature('POST', content_url, {}, APP_SECRET, params);


//var signedParams = copyObject(params);
//signedParams.timestamp = signInfo.timestamp;
//signedParams.nonce = signInfo.nonce;
//signedParams.sign = signInfo.sign;


var op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: JSON.stringify(params),
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie,
        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    }
};

op = JSON.stringify(op);
java.log(op);
data = java.ajax(base_url + content_url + `,${op}`);

try {
    data = JSON.parse(data);
    if (data.msg) {
        java.toast(data.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {}

content = data.content

if ((sources == "ç•ªèŒ„" || sources == "ä¸ƒçŒ«" || sources == "å¡”è¯»") && getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqpara") == "on" && tab == "å°è¯´") {
    var fqssionid = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqssionid") || "";
    content = content
        .replace(/ident="/g, 'ident="' + base_url)
        .replace(/book_id=/g, 'book_id=' + book_id + '&ssionid=' + fqssionid);
    if (device_type == "è‹¹æœ") {
        content = paraForiOS(content, sources);
    } else {
        content = paraForAndroid(content, sources);
    }


}
data = JSON.stringify({
    content: content,
});

if (device_type == "å®‰å“" && (tab == "çŸ­å‰§" || tab == "è§†é¢‘" || sources == 'æ¯’èˆŒå½±è§†')) {
    data = {
        content: `ã€å³ä¸Šè§’åˆ·æ–°ã€‘å¼€å¯æ’­æ”¾(ä¸‹ä¸€é›†è¯·åˆ‡æ¢ä¸‹ä¸€ç« åˆ·æ–°)\næ’­æ”¾ç›´é“¾ï¼š\n${content}`,
    };
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
    if (book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
        let video_url = `${base_url}/online_video?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}`;
        if (sources == 'æ¯’èˆŒå½±è§†') {
            video_url = content;
        };
        java.startBrowser(video_url, title);
        java.toast("æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½è§†é¢‘...");
    }

}
data;
</js>$.content

<js>
let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
if (res.method) {
    res = Object.fromEntries(
        res.body
        .replace("source", "sources")
        .split("&")
        .map((query) => query.split("="))
    );
    res.url = "";
}
let book_id = res.book_id;
java.put('book_id', book_id);
let tab = res.tab;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;
let html = "";
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (url != "" && proxy == "æœ¬åœ°") {
    if (sources == '69ä¹¦å§') {
        let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
        let headers = {
            "Cookie": ck69
        };
        let op = JSON.stringify({
            "headers": headers
        });
        html = java.ajax(url + ',' + op);
    } else {
        html = java.ajax(url);
    }
    //java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69ä¹¦å§') {
        cookie.removeCookie(url);
        var x = `https://www.69shuba.com`;
        java.longToast('éœ€è¦çœŸäººéªŒè¯ï¼Œè¯·è¿›å…¥ä»»æ„ä¹¦ç±è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿‡éªŒè¯');
        var s = java.startBrowserAwait(x, "éœ€è¦çœŸäººéªŒè¯ï¼Œè¯·è¿›å…¥ä»»æ„ä¹¦ç±è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿‡éªŒè¯").body();

        let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
        let headers = {
            "Cookie": ck69
        };
        let op = JSON.stringify({
            "headers": headers
        });
        //java.log(op);
        html = java.ajax(url + ',' + op);
        //java.log(html);
    }
};
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: {
        html: html
    }
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
let varia = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
if (varia == 'null') {
    varia = '';
}
varia = JSON.stringify({
    'custom': varia
});
// varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
//java.log(`${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`);
let data = java.ajax(
    `${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`
);
let device, device_type;
try {
    device = java.deviceID();
    device_type = "è‹¹æœ";
} catch (e) {
    try {
        device = java.androidId();
        device_type = "å®‰å“";
    } catch (e) {
        device = "";
        device_type = "å®‰å“";
    }
}

if (tab == "å°è¯´") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 0;
    }
} else if (tab == "å¬ä¹¦") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 32;
    } else {
        book.type = 1;
    }
} else if (tab == "æ¼«ç”»") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 64;
    } else {
        book.type = 2;
    }
} else if (tab == "çŸ­å‰§") {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 3;
    }
} else {
    if (device_type == "å®‰å“") {
        book.type = 8;
    } else {
        book.type = 0;
    }
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let reading = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "reading");

if (book && book.order != 0 && reading == '1') {
    try {
        if (!data || !book.variable || !base_url || !qtcookie) {
            java.log('ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦å‚æ•°');
        } else {
            let parsedData;
            try {
                parsedData = JSON.parse(data);
            } catch (e) {
                java.log('è§£ædataæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:' + e);
            }
            
            if (parsedData && parsedData.data && Array.isArray(parsedData.data) && parsedData.data[book.durChapterIndex]) {
                let ritem = parsedData.data[book.durChapterIndex];
                let bookInfoObj;
                try {
                    bookInfoObj = JSON.parse(book.variable);
                } catch (e) {
                    java.log('è§£æbook.variableå¤±è´¥:' + e);
                }
                
                if (bookInfoObj) {
                    let book_info;
                    try {
                        book_info = JSON.parse(bookInfoObj.book_detail || JSON.stringify(bookInfoObj));
                    } catch (e) {
                        java.log('è§£æbook_detailå¤±è´¥:' + e);
                    }
                    
                    if (book_info && typeof book_info === 'object') {
                        let rurl = base_url + '/add_book_to_book_shelf,';
                        book_info['read_status'] = 1;
                        book_info['last_chapter_item_id'] = ritem.item_id || '';
                        book_info['last_chapter_title'] = ritem.title || '';
                        let rop = {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                cookie: qtcookie
                            },
                            body: book_info
                        };
                        let check_book_url = base_url + '/check_book_in_book_shelf,';
                        let checkResponse;
                        
                        try {
                            checkResponse = java.ajax(check_book_url + JSON.stringify(rop));
                        } catch (e) {
                            java.log('æ£€æŸ¥ä¹¦ç±è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥:' + e);
                        }
                        
                        if (checkResponse) {
                            let check_data;
                            try {
                                check_data = JSON.parse(checkResponse).data;
                            } catch (e) {
                                java.log('è§£ææ£€æŸ¥å“åº”å¤±è´¥:' + e);
                            }
                            try {
                                if (check_data && check_data.id) {
                                    book_info['id'] = check_data.id;
                                    let uurl = base_url + '/update_book_shelf,';
                                    java.ajax(uurl + JSON.stringify(rop));
                                } else {
                                    java.ajax(rurl + JSON.stringify(rop));
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                java.log('ä¹¦æ¶æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥:' + e);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    } catch (error) {
        java.log('ä¹¦ç±åŒæ­¥æµç¨‹å¼‚å¸¸:' + error);
        java.longToast('\nåŒæ­¥é˜…è¯»è¿›åº¦å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½†ä¸å½±å“é˜…è¯»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å‰å¾€ç™»å½•å…³é—­ä¹¦æ¶åŒæ­¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚');
    }
}
data;
</js>$.data
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let tab = result.tab;
let sources = result.source;
let title = result.title;
let item_id = result.item_id;
let book_id = java.get("book_id");
let url = result.toc_url || "";
let qtcontent = {
    book_id: book_id,
    item_id: item_id,
    title: title,
    sources: sources,
    tab: tab,
    url: url,
};
qtcontent = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(qtcontent));
if (sources == 'å·') {
    content_url = item_id
} else if ((sources == "ç•ªèŒ„" || sources == "ä¸ƒçŒ«" || sources == "å¡”è¯»") && tab == "å°è¯´") {
    var base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server") || "";
    var fqssionid = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqssionid") || "";
    let sourcess = sources.replace('svip_', '');
    content_url = `data:;base64,${qtcontent},{"type":"qingtian3","js":"book ? result : '${base_url}/get_review?book_id=${book_id}&item_id=${item_id}&ssionid=${fqssionid}&source=${sourcess}'"}`;
} else {
    content_url = `data:;base64,${qtcontent},{"type":"qingtian3"}`;
}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'source');
let disabled_sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'disabled_sources');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:") || String(key).startsWith("mï¼š")) {
    media = "æ¼«ç”»"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("t:") || String(key).startsWith("tï¼š")) {
    media = "å¬ä¹¦"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:") || String(key).startsWith("dï¼š")) {
    media = "çŸ­å‰§"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:") || String(key).startsWith("xï¼š")) {
    media = "å°è¯´"
    key = key.slice(2)
} else {
    media = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'media');
}
if (key.includes('@')) {
    var parts = key.split('@');
    key = parts[0];
    sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let op = {
    method: "GET",
    headers: {
        cookie: qtcookie
    },
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}&disabled_sources=${disabled_sources},${op}`
</js>

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" Â· "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} Â· ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//å¦‚æœè¦æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼Œè¯·å»é™¤æ³¨é‡Šï¼Œå»é™¤ä¼šå½±å“æœç´¢é€Ÿåº¦
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='ç•ªèŒ„'){
//	'ç•ªèŒ„:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='ä¸ƒçŒ«'){
//	'ä¸ƒçŒ«:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>
